Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui.controller

Class BoardController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui.controller.BoardController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GUIController
public class BoardController extends Object implements GUIController
GUI Controller for the Board Scene (main scene)

    • entranceStudentOnClick

      private void entranceStudentOnClick(javafx.event.Event event)
      Specifies the behavior of the UI after a click on a student on the entrance. Sets enabled the dining room and the islands as destinations of the pawn
      Parameters:
      event - Click event on the student's pawn

    • motherNatureOnClick

      private void motherNatureOnClick(javafx.event.Event event)
      Specifies the behavior of the UI after a click on Mother Nature. Sets the islands as destination, adding the borderOnHover CSS Style to them
      Parameters:
      event - Click Event

    • cloudOnClick

      private void cloudOnClick(javafx.event.Event event)
      Specifies the behavior of the UI after a selection of a cloud, getting the choice from the user based on the FX:ID of the source node of the event
      Parameters:
      event - Click event

    • islandOnClick

      private void islandOnClick(javafx.event.Event event)
      Specifies the behavior of the UI after a click on an island, registering the choice from the user based on the FX:ID of the source node of the event. If the source of the click event is a MotherNature pawn, then the method calculates if the number of steps are possible, considering if the islands are linked together. If the source of the click event is a student, a request to move the student is fired to the server. Graphical Style of the pawns involved in the event are changed accordingly
      Parameters:
      event - Click Event

    • diningRoomOnClick

      private void diningRoomOnClick(javafx.event.Event event)
      If the Source of the click event is valid, then a request is fired to move the student to the dining room to the server
      Parameters:
      event - Click event

    • colorOnClick

      private void colorOnClick(javafx.event.Event event)
      Helper method for Character Card 6, 7, 8, that require the choice of a color for the action. if (sourceNode == null) branch handles cards 6, 8. else branch handles card 7, which requires a student and a color
      Parameters:
      event - Click Event

    • endActionOnClick

      private void endActionOnClick(javafx.event.Event event)
      When the End Action button is pressed, a new request is fired ("endAction")
      Parameters:
      event -

    • playStopMusic

      private void playStopMusic(javafx.event.Event event)
      Plays and pauses the soundtrack in-game music when the button is pressed, and the icon is changed accordingly
      Parameters:
      event -

    • exitGame

      private void exitGame(javafx.event.Event event)
      Quits the application
